DOC.criteria: Eligible subject male female age 60 year old significant health issue clinically significant abnormal laboratory value . A subject must meet follow criterion eligible inclusion study : 1 . Sexually active male willing use contraceptive study 4 month study . 2 . Female subject child bear potential ( surgically sterile postmenopausal longer 1 year ) 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 32 kg/m2 inclusive 4 . Willing maintain current diet exercise routine duration study 5 . Willing able return clinic visit complete studyrelated procedure 6 . Able read understand , willing sign ICF 1 . Significant concomitant illness , limited cardiac , renal , rheumatologic , gastrointestinal , hematological , skeletal/muscular , neurologic , psychiatric , endocrine , metabolic immunological disease . 2 . Evidence malnutrition 3 . Cachexia cause 4 . Evidence history muscle diseases weakness exception age related muscle loss 5 . Limb amputation 6 . Immobilization , surgical procedure , fracture , trauma upper low limb within 6 month 7 . History evidence heart diseases include limited coronary heart disease with/without history myocardial infarction , chronic acute heart failure ( New York Heart Association [ NYHA ] stage 24 ) , cardiac arrhythmia clinical symptom , valvular heart disease , cardiac hypertrophy clinical significance 8 . Women childbearing potential ( surgically sterile amenorrheic least 12 month postmenopausal ) 9 . Uncontrolled diabetes define HbA1C > 7.5 screening ; take oral hypoglycemic drug , stable dos medication 3 month . Diabetics use insulin exclude 10 . Asthmatic subject current recur symptom within 1 year . 11 . History , COPD , chronic kidney disease , cancer except primary basalcell skin cancer adequately treat 12 . Neurological injury ( eg , stroke ) within 1 year 13 . Abnormal uncontrolled blood pressure screen visit define diastolic BP > 95 and/or systolic BP > 160 mm Hg ; take hypertensive medication , stable dos medication 3 month 14 . Hepatic transaminase ( ALT AST ) > 2X ULN 15 . Reduced renal function define eGFR < 60 mL/min 16 . Current smoker previous smoker stop smoke within 6 month 17 . Current recent history ( within 1 year screen ) alcohol drug abuse 18 . History hypersensitivity response biologics 19 . History hypersensitivity doxycycline tetracycline antibiotic 20 . Current recent participation clinical trial ( within 30 day small molecular drug within 3 month biologics ) 21 . Exposure within 3 month approve biological drug .
